casebody.data:
BARTLETT
v.
BECK. No. 236P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Theodis Beck. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of May 2006 by Plaintiff for "Notice of Appeal (Constitutional Issues)": "Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
